title: No, Sloan Kettering Scientists Did Not Discover That mRNA Vaccines ‘Promote Cancer’
subtitle: Reporters at Natural News would apparently be shocked to learn that mRNA molecules are already present in every cell of their bodies.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: According to research by scientists at the Sloan Kettering Institute, mRNA vaccines may interfere with tumor-suppressing genes in a way that could promote cancer.
